privacy.title: Pivacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Tiktokio.cam
privacy.paragraph_1: Welcome to tiktokio.cam! Your privacy is most important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website and services.
privacy.paragraph_2: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.
privacy.paragraph_3: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
privacy.col_text1: What information we collect and use
privacy.1_col: When you register, make a purchase, or use our services, we may gather personal information such as your name, email address, and contact information.
privacy.2_col: We collect information about how you access and use our services, such as your IP address, browser type, and usage trends.
privacy.h3_col_1: To deliver and maintain our services.
privacy.h3_col_2: To alert you of changes to our service.
privacy.h3_col_4: For analyzing and improving our services.
privacy.col4_text1: We use cookies and other tracking technologies to monitor and store user activity on our site. You may set your browser to reject all cookies or notify you when one is received.
privacy.col5_text1: Our top priority is the protection of your data. We use a number of security technologies and safeguards to keep your information safe from unauthorized access, use or disclosure.
privacy.col6_text1: We do not sell or rent user personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with trusted partners for business reasons such as data analytics or advertising, in conformity with this Privacy Policy.
privacy.col7_text1: Your information, including personal data, may be transferred to and stored on systems located outside of your state or country, where data privacy regulations may differ.
privacy.col8_text1: You have the right to see, change, or delete the information we have about you. You may also choose whether or not to receive marketing communications from us.
privacy.col9_text1: We may periodically amend our Privacy Policy. We will keep you informed of any changes by publishing the revised Privacy Policy on this website.
privacy.col10_text1: If you have any queries about our Privacy Policy, please get in touch with us at [help@tiktokio.cam].

contact.title: Get Answers to Your Tiktokio Questions.
contact.content: Whether you have a question about Tiktok video downloader without watermark, need support, or just want to share your feedback, we're all ears. Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
